channel.title: Raise selective skill through command
channel.description:
What if i wanted a command to raise a skill a certain number of xp for a certain player but make it so only people with playerRights >=2 and if i wanted the command to go something like " ::train (skill) (xp) (player)
anyone want to tell me how i'de go about doing this?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 11:32:38 PM[/size][hr]also how would i make a command that would make it so that once you get mage, range, def, atk, and str up to 99 that it would automatically put your prayer up to 99?
